Constant Field Values

START_WITH

public static final int START_WITH
START_WITH is treated same as "Between (Inclusive) " where second value is same as first value plus max byte. Keys must be sorted.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NOT_START_WITH

public static final int NOT_START_WITH
NOT_START_WITH is treated as "Not Between (Inclusive)" internally where second value is same as first value plus max byte.

testValue

public boolean testValue(Value value)
Description copied from interface: IndexQuery
testValue tests the specified value for validity against this IndexQuery. The helper classes in org.apache.xindice.core.indexer.helpers should be used for optimized performance.

Specified by:
testValue in interface IndexQuery
Parameters:
value - The Value to compare
Returns:
Whether or not the value matches
